file_insights.description: Test suite for ReticulumWrapper reaction methods

patterns_discovered: Using multiple mock layers for complex module imports
Comprehensive edge case testing for emoji reactions
Simulating different failure scenarios in reaction sending
gotchas_discovered: Handling various emoji types with variation selectors
Managing identity recall and caching mechanisms
Detecting and parsing Field 16 reaction metadata
recommendations: Consider adding more boundary tests for unicode emoji handling
Implement logging for reaction sending failures
Add performance benchmarks for reaction message processing
